Token.Abstract: RKEntityMapping objects model an object mapping with a Core Data destination entity.
Initializes the receiver with a given entity.

Parameter.Name: entity
Parameter.Abstract: An entity with which to initialize the receiver.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The receiver, initialized with the given entity.

Token.Abstract: A convenience initializer that creates and returns an entity mapping for the entity with the given name in the managed object model of the given managed object store.

Parameter.Name: entityName
Parameter.Abstract: The name of the entity in the managed object model for which an entity mapping is to be created.

Parameter.Name: managedObjectStore
Parameter.Abstract: A managed object store containing the managed object model in which an entity with the given name is defined.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A new entity mapping for the entity with the given name in the managed object model of the given managed object store.

Token.Abstract: The Core Data entity description used for this object mapping
The Core Data entity description used for this object mapping

The array of NSAttributeDescription objects specifying the attributes of the receiver's entity that are used during mapping to determine whether an existing object should be updated or a new managed object should be inserted. Please see the "Entity Identification" section of this document for more information.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An array of identifying attributes or nil if none have been configured. @raises NSInvalidArgumentException Raised if the setter is invoked with the name of an attribute or an NSAttributeDescription that does not exist in the receiver's entity. Also raised if the setter is invoked with an empty array.

Token.Abstract: The array of NSAttributeDescription objects specifying the attributes of the receiver's entity that are used during mapping to determine whether an existing object should be updated or a new managed object should be inserted. Please see the "Entity Identification" section of this document for more information.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An array of identifying attributes or nil if none have been configured. @raises NSInvalidArgumentException Raised if the setter is invoked with the name of an attribute or an NSAttributeDescription that does not exist in the receiver's entity. Also raised if the setter is invoked with an empty array.

Token.Abstract: An optional predicate used to filter identified objects during mapping.
An optional predicate used to filter identified objects during mapping.
Returns the array of RKConnectionDescripton objects configured for connecting relationships during object mapping.
Returns the array of RKConnectionDescripton objects configured for connecting relationships during object mapping.
Adds a connection to the receiver.
Removes a connection from the receiver.
Adds a connection for the specified relationship connected using the attributes specified by the given NSString, NSArray, or NSDictionary object.

Parameter.Name: relationshipOrName
Parameter.Abstract: The relationship object or name of the relationship object that is to be connected.

Parameter.Name: connectionSpecifier
Parameter.Abstract: An NSString, NSArray, or NSDictionary object specifying how the relationship is to be connected by matching attributes.

Token.Abstract: Returns the connection for the specified relationship.

Parameter.Name: relationshipOrName
Parameter.Abstract: The relationship object or name of the relationship object for which to retrieve the connection.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The connection object for the specified relationship or nil if none is configured.

Token.Abstract: A predicate that identifies objects for the receiver's entity that are to be deleted from the local store.
A predicate that identifies objects for the receiver's entity that are to be deleted from the local store.

Returns the default value for the specified attribute as expressed in the Core Data entity definition. This value will be assigned if the object mapping is applied and a value for a missing attribute is not present in the payload.
Enables or disabled entity identification inference.

Parameter.Name: enabled
Parameter.Abstract: A Boolean value indicating if entity identification inference is to be performed.

Token.Abstract: Returns a Boolean value that indicates if entity identification inference has been enabled.

ReturnValue.Abstract: YES if entity identification inference is enabled, else NO.
